CustomField.description: Do not auto number - Do not auto number questions Auto number questions over the entire survey - Auto number questions relative to the survey as a whole Auto number each page of questions separately - Restart auto numbering on each page starting at 1
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Choose the desired question auto numbering option: No numbering: Questions will not be numbered. Sequential numbering: Questions will be numbered sequentially throughout the entire survey. Section-based numbering: Questions will be numbered separately within each section, starting from 1 for each new section.
CustomField.label: Question Auto Numbering

value.fullName: Auto number questions over the entire survey
value.label: Sequential numbering

value.fullName: Auto number each section of questions separately
value.label: Section-based numbering
